title: Aveeno Daily Moisturizer, Body Lotion, For Dry Skin, Prebiotic Oat Fragrance Free, 18 fl. oz, Pack of 1
description: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion with Prebiotic Oat formula intensely nourishes dry skin. Formulated with a soothing prebiotic oat, the fragrance-free lotion has clinically proven moisturization that lasts 24 hours. This daily body lotion nourishes and helps replenish skin's natural moisture barrier. The unique prebiotic oat formula absorbs quickly and nourishes dry skin with moisture, leaving your skin soft, beautiful and healthy-looking. Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion's gentle formula does not contain fragrances, parabens, or dyes. From the dermatologist-recommended brand, this nourishing lotion for dry skin has been allergy tested and non-greasy, non-comedogenic, and gentle enough for daily use as part of a regular skincare and beauty routine. To use, apply daily as often as needed.
